tool_description: Tracks and records return processing metrics and outcomes for business analytics and continuous improvement.

final_outcome.description: Final processing outcome: full_refund, partial_refund, exchange, rejected

error_messages: Invalid return_id: Return ID must be valid and exist in system.
Invalid time range: Process end time must be after start time.
Invalid final_outcome: Outcome must be one of [full_refund, partial_refund, exchange, rejected].
Invalid refund_amount: Amount must be non-negative number.
Analytics recording failed: Unable to save analytics data.
usage: Use at completion of return processing to record metrics and outcomes. Essential for process improvement and business intelligence.

analytics_recorded.description: Whether analytics data was successfully recorded

record_id.description: Unique identifier for this analytics record
